item.title: Great Statistics Books to Read
item.description: Opinionated Lessons on Statistics Introduction to Statistical Learning The Elements of Statistical Learning Applied Predicitive Modeling Statistical Inference Statistical Rethinking Data Analysis Using Regression and Multilevel/Hierarchical Models Mostly Harmless Econometrics Mastering Metrics: The Path from Cause to Effect All of Statistics Statistics Statistics for Experimenters Think Bayes Computer Age Statistical Inference Think Stats Machine Learning for Hackers Probability and Statistics Statistical Evidence: A likelihood paradigm
